title: Data Governance / Data Quality Engineer
bullets: Built SQL-based data quality checks across 50+ validation rules using Great Expectations
Designed and maintained ETL/ELT pipelines processing 10M+ records daily on AWS
Created real-time dashboards monitoring rule pass/fail rates with Python and Tableau
Automated data profiling and anomaly detection using AWS Glue and Lambda
Implemented data lineage tracking and metadata management across enterprise datasets

title: Data Center Technician
bullets: Managed server infrastructure supporting data pipelines and analytics workloads
Monitored database performance and optimized query execution on production systems
Configured networking for distributed data processing clusters
Implemented automated backup and disaster recovery procedures for critical data stores
